tool_description: An API that shows the latest news articles from over 70 different websites around the world for Crypto, Bitcoin, and Ethereum
name: Crypto News_v11
title: Crypto News

api_list.name: Get Crypto news from Single Website
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve all the news articles about Crypto from a single website
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news19.p.rapidapi.com/website/CoinDesk"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news19.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news19.p.rapidapi.com/website/{website}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news19.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
